txt.en: A number of quests have been completed for you. Check your Quest Journal to learn more.
You have created a level 20 character.
You have been awarded many skills. Go to your Character Panel to access your Skill Panel and review other available skills or to add more skills to your quickslots.
Useful items have been placed in your inventory. Open your bags to see what you have.
To earn this deed, you must start a level 20 character and complete the horse-ride to Weathertop.
Maps allow you to quickly travel to known locations. Your known map skills are located in your Skills Panel.
To earn this deed, you must start a level 20 character and complete the horse-ride to Weathertop.
Major towns and hubs are the best place to sell unwanted goods and purchase new items. The nearest Auction Hall can be found in Bree-town.
The LOTRO Store offers many convenience items from accelerators to mounts, cosmetics, crafting items, boosts, and more.
Follow the Epic Story to learn more about the untold stories of Middle-earth. You can find it in your Quest Journal.
Several consumables have been given to you to help you on your way. Remember to check your inventory for useful items.
Traits enable you to specialize your character. Visit a Bard in any major town to change Traits and enhance your character further.
Enter the world as a level 20 character
Each class has special useable items to help them survive. Some have been provided for you to experiment with.
If you are new to LOTRO and would like additional information, consider starting a new character at level 1 for a more complete tutorial.
Having started at an advanced level, you are being asked to assist Candaith in Weathertop. Ride there via Saeradan's horse and learn the secrets of Middle-earth.
